            <h2 class="Box-title">
              <a href="#readme" data-view-component="true" class="Link--primary">README.md</a>
            </h2>
          </div>
        </div>

          <div data-target="readme-toc.content" class="Box-body px-5 pb-5">
            <article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg" itemprop="text">
<p dir="auto"><a href="https://github.com/bootique/bootique/actions"><img src="https://github.com/bootique/bootique/workflows/build%20test%20deploy/badge.svg" alt="build test deploy" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<a href="https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.bootique/bootique" rel="nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a681037706366dce0b1a5a57f197666e85998b426169d8d190ce7ce8cb92996c/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f6d6176656e2d63656e7472616c2f762f696f2e626f6f74697175652f626f6f74697175652e7376673f636f6c6f72423d627269676874677265656e" alt="Maven Central" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.bootique/bootique.svg?colorB=brightgreen" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>
<p dir="auto">Bootique is a <a href="https://medium.com/@andrus_a/bootique-a-minimally-opinionated-platform-for-modern-java-apps-644194c23872#.odwmsbnbh" rel="nofollow">minimally opinionated</a>
java launcher and integration technology. It is intended for building container-less runnable Java applications.
With Bootique you can create REST services, webapps, jobs, DB migration tasks, etc. and run them as if they were
simple commands. No JavaEE container required! Among other things Bootique is an ideal platform for
Java <a href="http://martinfowler.com/articles/microservices.html" rel="nofollow">microservices</a>, as it allows you to create a fully-functional
app with minimal setup.</p>
<p dir="auto">Each Bootique app is a collection of modules interacting with each other via dependency injection. This GitHub project
provides Bootique core. Bootique team also develops a number of important modules. A full list is available
<a href="http://bootique.io/docs/" rel="nofollow">here</a>.</p>
<h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-quick-links" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#quick-links"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Quick Links</h2>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://bootique.io" rel="nofollow">WebSite</a></li>
<li><a href="https://bootique.io/docs/2.x/getting-started/" rel="nofollow">Getting Started</a></li>
<li><a href="https://bootique.io/docs/" rel="nofollow">Docs</a> - documentation collection for Bootique core and all standard
modules.</li>
</ul>
<h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-support" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#support"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Support</h2>
<p dir="auto">You have two options:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/bootique/bootique/issues">Open an issue</a> on GitHub with a label of "help wanted" or "question"
(or "bug" if you think you found a bug).</li>
<li>Post a question on the <a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bootique-user" rel="nofollow">Bootique forum</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-tldr" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#tldr"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>TL;DR</h2>
<p dir="auto">For the impatient, here is how to get started with Bootique:</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Declare the official module collection:</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-text-xml notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<dependencyManagement>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.bootique.bom</groupId>
            <artifactId>bootique-bom</artifactId>
            <version>3.0.M1</version>
            <type>pom</type>
            <scope>import</scope>
        </dependency> 
    </dependencies>
</dependencyManagement>"><pre><<span class="pl-ent">dependencyManagement</span>>
    <<span class="pl-ent">dependencies</span>>
        <<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>>
            <<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>io.bootique.bom</<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>
            <<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>bootique-bom</<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>
            <<span class="pl-ent">version</span>>3.0.M1</<span class="pl-ent">version</span>>
            <<span class="pl-ent">type</span>>pom</<span class="pl-ent">type</span>>
            <<span class="pl-ent">scope</span>>import</<span class="pl-ent">scope</span>>
        </<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>> 
    </<span class="pl-ent">dependencies</span>>
</<span class="pl-ent">dependencyManagement</span>></pre></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Include the modules that you need:</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-text-xml notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>io.bootique.jersey</groupId>
        <artifactId>bootique-jersey</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>io.bootique.logback</groupId>
        <artifactId>bootique-logback</artifactId>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>"><pre><<span class="pl-ent">dependencies</span>>
    <<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>>
        <<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>io.bootique.jersey</<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>
        <<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>bootique-jersey</<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>
    </<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>>
    <<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>>
        <<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>io.bootique.logback</<span class="pl-ent">groupId</span>>
        <<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>bootique-logback</<span class="pl-ent">artifactId</span>>
    </<span class="pl-ent">dependency</span>>
</<span class="pl-ent">dependencies</span>></pre></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Write your app:</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-java notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="package com.foo;

import io.bootique.Bootique;

public class Application {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Bootique
            .app(args)
            .autoLoadModules()
            .exec()
            .exit();
    }
}"><pre><span class="pl-k">package</span> <span class="pl-s1">com</span>.<span class="pl-s1">foo</span>;

<span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-s1">io</span>.<span class="pl-s1">bootique</span>.<span class="pl-s1">Bootique</span>;

<span class="pl-k">public</span> <span class="pl-k">class</span> <span class="pl-smi">Application</span> {
    <span class="pl-k">public</span> <span class="pl-k">static</span> <span class="pl-smi">void</span> <span class="pl-en">main</span>(<span class="pl-smi">String</span>[] <span class="pl-s1">args</span>) {
        <span class="pl-s1">Bootique</span>
            .<span class="pl-en">app</span>(<span class="pl-s1">args</span>)
            .<span class="pl-en">autoLoadModules</span>()
            .<span class="pl-en">exec</span>()
            .<span class="pl-en">exit</span>();
    }
}</pre></div>
<p dir="auto">It has <code>main()</code> method, so you can run it!</p>
<p dir="auto"><em>For a more detailed tutorial proceed to <a href="https://bootique.io/docs/2.x/getting-started/" rel="nofollow">this link</a>.</em></p>
<h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-upgrading" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#upgrading"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M7.775 3.275a.75.75 0 001.06 1.06l1.25-1.25a2 2 0 112.83 2.83l-2.5 2.5a2 2 0 01-2.83 0 .75.75 0 00-1.06 1.06 3.5 3.5 0 004.95 0l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95-4.95l-1.25 1.25zm-4.69 9.64a2 2 0 010-2.83l2.5-2.5a2 2 0 012.83 0 .75.75 0 001.06-1.06 3.5 3.5 0 00-4.95 0l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 004.95 4.95l1.25-1.25a.75.75 0 00-1.06-1.06l-1.25 1.25a2 2 0 01-2.83 0z"></path></svg></a>Upgrading</h2>
<p dir="auto">See the "maven-central" badge above for the current production version of <code>bootique-bom</code>.
When upgrading, don't forget to check <a href="https://github.com/bootique/bootique/blob/master/UPGRADE.md">upgrade notes</a>
specific to your version.</p>
